articles.title: Actor and singer Lee Ji-han dies in Seoul crowd crush, Korean celebrities express sorrow over tragedy - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: Lee, who competed in the reality show Produce 101, was one of the victims in the Itaewon incident. Meanwhile, the likes of G-Dragon and footballer Son Heung-min took to social media to express their condolences to everyone affected by the tragedy.

articles.title: Asia-Pacific stocks mixed as China's factory and services activity contracts - CNBC
articles.description: Shares in the Asia-Pacific were mixed on Monday as China factory activity missed expectations, and as the market looks ahead to the U.S. Fed meeting this week.

articles.title: Probiotics may improve post-partum gut, metabolic health in women with gestational diabetes - NutraIngredients-Asia
articles.description: Probiotics supplementation can improve post-partum metabolic outcomes and the gut microbiota in women with a history of gestational diabetes, say researchers in Malaysia.

articles.title: At least 154 killed in South Korea Halloween crowd crush - Nikkei Asia
articles.description: Yoon declares mourning period as authorities investigate cause
articles.content:
SEOUL -- At least 154 people were killed in Seoul on Saturday night as Halloween revelers crushed their way into a small alley in the city's Itaewon district, fire authorities said on Sunday.
